description: Dell Optiplex GX620 SFF Desktop Computer.The OptiPlex GX platform is designed for business and individuals that are focused on affordable pricing coupled with top-level performance. This Dell Optiplex GX620 Small Form Factor Desktop Computer comes running an Intel Pentium 2.8 GHz Hyper Threading CPU (800FSB-2MB Cache), 2GB of DDR2 High Performance Memory, 80GB SATA Super Fast 7200RPM Hard Drive, CDRW/DVD Ultra Speed Drive, Write CD's and Watch DVD Movies, Integrated LAN and Sound. Wireless Capable. The Dell OptiPlex GX620 provides the perfect blend of relevant technology that users demand, all at a price that won't bust the budget. This model also comes with Windows XP Professional installed with COA
title: Dell GX620 SFF Desktop Computer, Powerful Intel 2.8GHz processor is included, LGA 775 CPU, Super Fast 2GB Interlaced DDR2 Memory, VGA Onboard Video, Fast 80GB SATA Hard Drive, DVD/CDRW Burn CD's and Play DVD's, Crystal Clear VGA Video, Intregrated Nic/Audio, XP Professional with COA
